name: 徐昕煒
objective:
本課程之目的在於教導學生能夠以線性代數中所提供之各種方法來求解線性連立方程組，並奠定研習線型規畫，作業研究，等課程之基礎。由於本系分兩組教學，因應之課程內容分別為：管理組：矩陣、方程式之解、行列式、向量、微分方程式及應用問題等。工程組：矩陣方程式之解、行列式、向量及向量空間等。
The objective of this course is to introduce the linear algebra by using several different methods to solve the linear dependent equations and to build up the fundamental knowledge of linear programming and Operation Research. Two groups instruct the contents of this course. For the engineering group the array, solution of combinatory equations, vectors, differential equations and its implementation are included. For the management group the array, solution of combinatory equations, vectors and vector spaces are included.
schedule:
Week 1: 課程介紹與線性系統 / Introduction to Systems of Linear Equations
Week 2: 高斯消去法與應用 / 
              Gaussian Elimination and Gauss-Jordan Elimination with Application
Week 3: 矩陣 /
              Operations with Matrices, Properties of Matrix Operations
Week 4: 矩陣 2/
              The Inverse of a Matrix, Elementary Matrices
Week 5: 行列式 /
             The Determinant of a Matrix, Evaluation of a Determinant
Week 6: 行列式 2/
             Properties of Determinants, Introduction to Eigenvalues
Week 7: 向量空間 /
              Vector Spaces, Subspaces, Spanning Sets
Week 8: 向量空間 2/
              Linear Independence, Basis and Dimension, Rank of a Matrix 
Week 9: Midterm Exam 
Week 10: 內積空間 /
                Inner Product Spaces
Week 11: 內積空間 2/
                Orthonormal Bases: Gram-Schmidt Process
Week 12: 內積空間 3/
                Mathematical Models and Least Squares Analysis
Week 13: 線性轉換 /
                Introduction to Linear Transformations, The Kernel and Range
Week 14: 線性轉換 2/
                Matrices for Linear Transformations, Transition Matrices and Similarity
Week 15: 特徵值與特徵向量 /
               Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors
Week 16: 特徵值與特徵向量 2/
                Diagonalization
Week 17: 特徵值與特徵向量 3/
                Symmetric Matrices and Orthogonal Diagonalization
Week 18: Final exam
